subject: Question on Plus X pedals and baseplate
description_text:
Hello

I am interested in the Simsonn Plus X pedals with haptics reactor and 
would like to knw if the baseplate does included the heel support or not.

Regards, Dietmar

Dietmar Stein

Solutions based on Linux

Am Kleinenberg 16
55444 Schweppenhausen

phone: +49 175 19 12 767
mail: contact@dietmarstein.com
www.: https://dietmarstein.com

conversations.body_text: Yes, the baseplate includes the heel support.
